You’re my reflection, all I see is you.
Forgot the butterflies I feel the whole zoo when I’m with you.
Never above you. Never below you. Always beside you.
I’m oxygen and he’s dying to breathe.
Three words. Eight letters. Say it, and I’m yours.
So go on and let the rain pour. I’ll be all you need and more.
I’d rather die tomorrow than live a hundred years without knowing you.
In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
Remember, we all stumble, every one of us. That’s why it’s a comfort to go hand in hand.
Don’t make me laugh, I’m trying to be mad at you.
If you hold onto one of my hands, I will be able to conquer the world.
You make me see the world in brighter colors when all I used to see before was dull shades of gray.
You have an amazing talent for making my heart smile.
I would rather share one lifetime with you than face all the ages of this world alone.
I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you.
Cuddling with you is one of my most favorite things to do.
I love you not only for what you are but for what I am when I am with you.
Eye to eye, so alive.
You are the compass that guides me through life.
You’re part of my entity, here for infinity.
Forget the fairy tales, I think our love story is the best one ever told.
I love that I get to have you all to myself.
The best thing about me is you.
I’m lucky in having found the perfect partner to spend my life with.
I can’t wait to see where else our love will lead us.
You’re a shooting star I see, a vision of ecstasy.
The best way to mend a broken heart is time and girlfriends.
Your words are my food, your breath my wine. You are everything to me.
I love your smile anyway, but I love it more when I am the reason.
You are the source of my joy, the center of my world and the whole of my heart.
People call me by my name but when you do it sounds better. I love you!
She’s my girlfriend/boyfriend because we both know what’s like to have people be jealous of us.
Our life together is one for the history books.
Two souls with but a single thought, Two hearts that beat as one.
When the sunshine, we shine together.
You wanna know who I’m in love with? Read the first word again.
Cuddling with you would be perfect right now.
So shine bright tonight, you and I.
We balance each other out so perfectly.
Now join your hands, and with your hands your hearts.
We were together. I forget the rest.
Nobody is perfect, but you’re so close it’s scary.
Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
We may have started as individuals, but now we are as one.
We’re beautiful like diamonds in the sky.
When we are together, the world feels like it is in perfect harmony.
We found love in a hopeless place.
Do you believe in love at first sight, or should I walk by again?
Staying together when things get tough will only make you a stronger couple.
I may not be a relationship expert but I do know who would make a cute couple – us two.
Sometimes we can disagree, but at the same time, there is something perfect about you and me.
The secrets of our long relationship are first we find out the similarities and second we respect the differences.
The best thing we can do in love treasure our relationships, not the possessions.
Soulmate: two little words, one big concept. A belief that someone, somewhere, is holding the key to your heart.
You know you’ve found someone special when they can lift your spirits simply with a smile.
Come live with me, and be my love, and we will some new pleasures prove, of golden sands, and crystal brooks, with silken lines and silver hooks.
Relationships are stronger when you’re best friends first, and a couple second.
Give me a photo of you so I can show Santa what I want for Christmas.
Loyalty is the strongest glue which makes a relationship last a lifetime.
After a while, I just want to be with the one who makes me laugh.
I always feel like our love is as new as the first day that I fell in love with you.
You da one that I dream about all day, you da one that I think about always.
